reviewText: this is one great movie staring Michelle Maren with an all star cast this is one great adult movie from 1980 Throat 12 Years After the Blu-ray is just great .

I saw this movie years ago and it was hot. Got a vhs copy and don't know what ever happened to it so to my delight I found it here on dvd. I like the story line and the sex is hot. Sharon Mitchell and Sharon Kane were hot in this movie, the first scene showing Mitchell with her "john" and telling him of an old experience as a school girl has gotta be one of my favorites. The orgy scene at the end is definitely sweet
